title: RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module > RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module > RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Documentation and Resources
content:

title: RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module > RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module > Product Description > RAK12006 PIR Module Overview
content: The RAK12006 is a Pyroelectric Infrared Radial (PIR) module. It is designed to detect occupancy and motion from infrared-radiating objects. The sensor uses AM312 from Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd.
parent_content: The RAK12006 is a Pyroelectric Infrared Radial (PIR) module. It is designed to detect occupancy and motion from infrared-radiating objects. The sensor uses AM312 from Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd.

title: RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module > RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module > Prerequisites > RAK12006 Module Requirements and Setup
content:
To use a **RAK12006**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12006** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12006**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12006** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
